David-
	sorry to say this looks modern to my eye, (maybe the photos), 
I am no tsuba guy but have never heard of melted shakudo. This looks 
like a modern attempt at aging or perhaps they were shooting for 
sahari. What does the color inside the hitsu look like?
-t
